= Project prologue =

== Introduction ==

First intention with this projetc is to control the [http://smplayer.berlios.de/index.php SMPlayer] on my home computer using my cellphone nokia 5800.


== Initial requirements ==

Communication Medium:
  * Wifi: More distance and standard

Computer side:
  * Server TCP/IP
  * Win32 process interface
Cellphone side:
  * Client TCP/IP
  * GUI to play,pause,open the player
